features: MOOKA B-D02L AIR PURIFIER FOR LARGE ROOM - With the high-efficiency filtration system, the air purifier covers an area up to 1076ft². 6 air changes per hour in 215ft², 1 air changes per hour in 1076ft². Modern design fits in any space from small to large rooms, bedrooms, living rooms, offices, nurseries, kitchens and basements. Perfect for pet owners, babies, children, the elderly, or anyone wanting to improve the air quality.

H13 TRUE HEPA AIR PURIFIER – The pre-filter, H13 true HEPA filter and high-efficiency activated carbon filter capture pet hair, dander, smoke, odor, and large dust particles, in addition to removing all airborne contaminants as small as 0.3 microns.

ULTRA-QUIET, ENERGY-SAVING & SAFE - Thanks to the new brushless motor, the 20dB noise level is almost voiceless. It cleans your air, doesn't affect your work, study or sleep. Running in low power makes it extremely energy-saving. Child lock prevents error operations caused by pets or children. The replacement filter should be replaced every 3-6 months depending on the environment and usage frequency (Search for B08PK4WM4W).

4 TIMER SETTINGS, 4 FAN MODES, AND NIGHT LIGHT – 4 timer options (1H/2H/4H/8H) allow you set the air purifier operating time. Adjust the required fan speed mode (Sleep/Low/Med/High) to capture as much air pollutants as required. Soft night light, that prevents falls, can be turned off to enjoy the perfect dreaming. Press the top power button for 3 seconds to turn ON/OFF the night light when the machine is running.

WORRY-FREE FOR LONG USE - We love our customers and take pride in providing a pleasant shopping experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Note:1.The power adapter is placed with the filter, please open the bottom base cover to find it.2.Please remove the new filter plastic bag before running the air purifier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Millions of people struggle with air pollution everyday!Here’s what the air near you,that means your health gets threatened. Smoke from Canada Wildfires Travels Across US to New York,the unhealthy air quality caused by smoke makes PM 2.5 skyrocketed, which gets into your respiration system. Wildfire smoke can be especially harmful to the health of elderly, pregnant,children. MOOKA True HEPA Air Purifier is Ideal for Your Family. Let Your Family Breathe Easily!

WHY CHOOSE US? High-efficiency filtration system: 1 air changes per hour in 1076ft², 6 air changes per hour in 215ft².High CADR index that gives you fresh air in 10 minutes. 3 stage filtration: Removes 99.97% of dust, pollen, smoke, odor, and pet dander,Which filters airborne particles as small as 0.3 microns. Ultra Quiet Sleep Mode: Thanks to the new technology brushless motor, the 20dB noise level is almost voiceless.You can enjoy quiet and peaceful sleep without Display. User Friendly：100% Ozone free air cleaner.13W rated power, uses little energy even when being used 24 hours a day. Wide Applications：Perfect for smokers,pets owners, babies, children, the elderly, or anyone wanting to improve the indoor air quality.

Choose Mooka HEPA air purifiers for home, Choose what you breathe in every day. Mooka B-D02L air purifier has been certified by California Air Resources Board and is available for California residents.

New Technology Child Lock To avoid error operations efficiently caused by pets or children out of curiosity. Tips:Hold the Timer button for 3-5 seconds to lock/unlock the air purifier. Smart Settings With touch screen display panel, It has 4 Speed Settings (Sleep/Low/Med/High) and 1/2/4/8H Timer settings,which fits your different purification needs and size of the room. Filter Change Reminder Fan speed indicator flashes when the filter replacement is needed. The replacement filter should be replaced every 3-6 months depending on the environment and usage frequency.

Specifications: Dimension: 7.1 x 7.1 x 11.1 inches Voltage: AC 100 V-240 V / 50-60 HZ Power: 13W Noise: 20 - 50 dB Package Contains: · 1 x Mooka B-D02L Air Purifier · 1 x H13 HEPA Filter (Pre-installed) · 1 x AC Adapter · 1 x User Manual Note: 1. Please remove the plastic bag of the new filter before running the air purifier. 2.The power adapter is placed with the filter, please open the bottom base cover to find it. 3.This appliance is for indoor use only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, small, moves a lot of air
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few of these to put in our bedrooms when covid hit our household since our other air purifiers are very large and noisy so they sit in the hall/living room. I liked them so much I bought 2 more to replace the old ones as well.They are so quiet on the lower settings that I often put my hand over it to make sure it's still on. The lights are pretty bright, but if you hold the power button a few seconds they turn off. The highest setting is a lot louder, but it's also a nice volume for some white noise while sleeping.Since they are so small and quiet I was not sure they actually work or move as much air as they say they do, but when I'm in bed about 10 feet away I can feel a little breeze, which I don't get from our other ones that are about half the capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than expected.
reviews.reviewText: We live in an older house and it has always had a certain smell to it. On top of that we have two bigger dogs and a cat. So needless to say we have all kinds of smells going on. I use to walk in the house after work and get knocked over by the smells. I was so self conscious about having guests over. I shopped around for a while for an air purifier. I wasn’t prepared to spend a lot of money on one, although I knew I would probably have to get a good one. But then I found this one. Read all the reviews, price was fantastic and I was excited. Shipping was quick. I loved how easy it was to set up and it’s quite even on high. The timer is an added benefit. After a few days of having it running, the smells were gone!!! I come home from work and can’t smell the old house, or animals. I would highly recommend this. Also the filters are super easy to change and inexpensive. Great air purifier all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little Purifier and does the job…with a tweak.
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews and was eager to figure out the light situation. Other than the lights, this little guy got rave reviews PLUS it’s marked down to his pennies with all the coupons on Black Friday/prime day. I figured out you have to hold down the power button on top for a solid 5-6 seconds or more to turn the top blue light off without turning the whole machine off. Problem 1 solved.Problem 2: the lights on the front. I loved this machine plus the little white ones are nice looking, sleek…and I’m fine with the lights because I sleep with an eye mask at night, my special needs son…not so easily persuaded. I configured 2 thin elastics (used in sewing), both tied in a bow around the circumference. Then attached a black thick ribbon (my choice of pirate theme) and hot glued it to the part of the elastic that goes over the blue light section. Basically a little purifier G-string. It’s moveable to access the controls if needed and holds tight against the light. Works great! I attached pictures for ideas to work off of but NOW…this machine is perfect!I would have given the machine a 5 ⭐️ BUT the front buttons for a machine that should also be able to be run at night should have the option to turn off. Anyway….Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: I live in a retirement community. My apartment is close to the kitchen and dining room, and unwelcome cooking odors often permeate my space. The Mooka has handled the odors perfectly. I turn it on only when I detect the cooking odors starting and turn it off in the evening. It keeps my apartment odor free. I usually keep it on the medium setting, and I don’t hear it running. On high it has just a slight hum, but you have to be up close to hear it. I like the blue light because it reminds me to turn it off at night so I’m not running it unnecessarily. It’s a great little unit and well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice product and I’m glad I bought it! I have this in my bedroom and on low you can hardly hear it, if you like to sleep to white noise, you can kick it up to medium or high. It has a blue light that glows, but you can turn that off. It fits perfectly on the top of my dresser and doesn’t take up too much room. I would buy it again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There is a bit of what I understand to be ozone smell when it starts up, but that goes away quickly. The nightlight is a nice touch. I have two dogs and a cat and it does a great job of eliminating odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my computer room to try to eliminate dog odor. Both of my dogs need to be in the room with me - actually any room I'm in. This works like a charm, so much so that I purchased an additional one for my bedroom. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked Great Until It Didn't
reviews.reviewText: It worked very well even better than anticipated. Unfortunately two months later it completely died. I thought it was the outlet at first but after trying several in my apartment it was clear that it was the purifier itself.
